TopicTitle: Ground trampoline bug launches wheeled/landingstruts and kerbals skyhigh.

Articles.Content:
https://gfycat.com/BogusBareFlicker

Video on the problem.

Seems to only happen on low grav planets, video is from the northpole of Moho. It jolts kerbals and certain wheelbased/strutbased vehicles into the sky. Tried starting a new game all together but the same things happens even with vanilla parts. "Simple rocket with landing struts".

I first suspected KAS but that's the only mod i got that do anything major, except B9 that is.

Anyone knows a solution?
